_ww-text_text.de: Lege jetzt los und nutze alle Features von tillyboard, um deine Produktion schnell und effektiv umzusetzen. Erstelle Storyboards, verwalte Equipment, plane Drehtage und vieles mehr – alles an einem Ort. Starte noch heute und revolutioniere deinen Filmproduktionsprozess!
_ww-text_text.en: Get started now and use all the features of tillyboard to execute your production quickly and efficiently. Create storyboards, manage equipment, plan shoot days, and much more – all in one place. Start today and revolutionize your film production process!

3933eef3-f46e-4845-9725-5bdf89f39043.code:
const user_id = pluginVariables[/* Supabase Auth user */ '1fa0dd68-5069-436c-9a7d-3b54c340f1fa']['user']?.['id']

const timestamp = context.workflow['0c431cb6-a91c-433a-a6e0-1c86ed2e73d8'].result

const pdf_name = context.workflow['a29a1779-36a8-444e-bc0e-f22b8f25ecfd'].result

const { data, error } = await wwLib.wwPlugins.supabaseAuth.publicInstance
  .storage
  .from('pdf_print')
  .createSignedUploadUrl(user_id + '/'+ timestamp+'/'+ pdf_name)

  return data

value.code: wwFormulas.switch(globalContext.page?.['lang'],"de","Call-Sheet - "+  wwFormulas.filterByKey(collections['cd42dc40-3072-4f7c-b669-56f3e8efa914']?.['data'],"id",globalContext.pageParameters['ProjektUID'])[0]?.project_name +"_"+  pluginFormulas['832d6f7a-42c3-43f1-a3ce-9a678272f811']['formatDateTimezone'](variables['e2027fd1-d23b-43ac-8aec-193e1e6998bd']?.['production_date']," DD MM YY hh mm",)+" Uhr","en","Call-Sheet - "+  wwFormulas.filterByKey(collections['cd42dc40-3072-4f7c-b669-56f3e8efa914']?.['data'],"id",globalContext.pageParameters['ProjektUID'])[0]?.project_name +"_"+  pluginFormulas['832d6f7a-42c3-43f1-a3ce-9a678272f811']['formatDateTimezone'](variables['e2027fd1-d23b-43ac-8aec-193e1e6998bd']?.['production_date']," MM DD YY hh mm A",))

de.code:
const equipment = collections['8daee9d2-96f6-4706-8371-93b25a3e0865']?.['data']
const filteredEquioment = equipment.filter(item => item.id == variables['50707d25-8af7-4e30-95c4-10482c35c6ff'])[0]?.items

const sumFilteredEquioment = filteredEquioment
  .filter(item => typeof item.quantity === 'number' && !isNaN(item.quantity))
.reduce((acc, item)=> acc + item.quantity, 0)

const filteredTemporary = equipment.filter(item => item.id == variables['50707d25-8af7-4e30-95c4-10482c35c6ff'])[0]?.temporary_items

const sumFilteredTemporary = filteredTemporary
  .filter(item => typeof item.quantity === 'number' && !isNaN(item.quantity))
  .reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.quantity, 0)

const finalResult = sumFilteredEquioment + sumFilteredTemporary


return finalResult

const equipment = collections['8daee9d2-96f6-4706-8371-93b25a3e0865']?.['data']
const filteredEquioment = equipment.filter(item => item.id == context.item.data?.['id'])[0]?.items

const sumFilteredEquioment = filteredEquioment
  .filter(item => typeof item.quantity === 'number' && !isNaN(item.quantity))
.reduce((acc, item)=> acc + item.quantity, 0)

const filteredTemporary = equipment.filter(item => item.id == context.item.data?.['id'])[0]?.temporary_items

const sumFilteredTemporary = filteredTemporary
  .filter(item => typeof item.quantity === 'number' && !isNaN(item.quantity))
  .reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.quantity, 0)

const finalResult = sumFilteredEquioment + sumFilteredTemporary


return finalResult

en.code:
const equipment = collections['8daee9d2-96f6-4706-8371-93b25a3e0865']?.['data']
const filteredEquioment = equipment.filter(item => item.id == context.item.data?.['id'])[0]?.items

const sumFilteredEquioment = filteredEquioment
  .filter(item => typeof item.quantity === 'number' && !isNaN(item.quantity))
.reduce((acc, item)=> acc + item.quantity, 0)

const filteredTemporary = equipment.filter(item => item.id == context.item.data?.['id'])[0]?.temporary_items

const sumFilteredTemporary = filteredTemporary
  .filter(item => typeof item.quantity === 'number' && !isNaN(item.quantity))
  .reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.quantity, 0)

const finalResult = sumFilteredEquioment + sumFilteredTemporary


return finalResult

_ww-text_text.de: Momentan sind uns keine Probleme mit tillyboard bekannt. Stimmt nicht?

Wir aktualisieren gerade die App und bitten um Verständnis. Versuche es in ein paar Minuten wieder.

const user_id = pluginVariables[/* Supabase Auth user */ '1fa0dd68-5069-436c-9a7d-3b54c340f1fa']['user']?.['id']

const timestamp = context.workflow['124c175e-8a26-432f-80e8-309dc8fd0174'].result

const pdf_name = context.workflow['8a70fa07-ea0d-4f05-818b-7d87e9eb6014'].result

const { data, error } = await wwLib.wwPlugins.supabaseAuth.publicInstance
  .storage
  .from('pdf_print')
  .createSignedUploadUrl(user_id + '/'+ timestamp+'/'+ pdf_name)

  return data
